MATTEO

×

Sewn Manufactured Goods

MATTEO imports textiles from all over the world to produce a variety of sewn products, primarily focused on garment dyed bedding products. MATTEO offers their products through web purchases, showroon and other sellers such as GILT and abc.

ZOOSHOO

×

Ladies' Shoes

Mainly an online women's fashion retailer with a big focus on ladies' shoes. They also offer a variety of selections clothing as accessories and jewelry.

twitch

×

Where Streamers Play

The twitch platform allows gamers to share their gameplay. Often creating a big following earning subcriptions and donations. In an effort to show subscriber loyalty, streamers often have a variety of badges. Streamer Emotes allow subscribers to express themselves in their chats, other chats and even other platforms like Discord.
